image.alt: Welcoming orthodontic team smiling with patients at Cometti Orthodontics in Gillette, WY

paragraphs.text: Welcome to Cometti Orthodontics — a patient-centered practice in Gillette, WY focused on creating healthy, beautiful smiles for every age. We combine experienced clinicians, cutting‑edge orthodontic technology, and personalized treatment plans to deliver comfortable care that fits your life.

Our team guides each patient through diagnosis, treatment, and retention while emphasizing whole‑person health and long‑term stability. Expect clear communication, convenient scheduling, and care designed around your goals.

items.title: Board‑Certified Care
items.text: Dr. Peyton Cometti is board certified and leads care rooted in advanced training and evidence‑based techniques.

items.title: Treatment for All Ages
items.text: Comprehensive care for kids, teens, and adults—early evaluations, teen options, and discreet adult treatments.

items.title: Modern, Personalized Plans
items.text: Clear aligners and braces are paired with modern diagnostics to create efficient, individualized treatment.

items.title: Local Access & Satellite Care
items.text: Convenient Gillette location with a monthly satellite in Buffalo and flexible scheduling for busy families.

paragraphs.text: Peyton Cometti, D.D.S., M.S.D., is board certified by the American Board of Orthodontics and provides orthodontic and dentofacial orthopedic care with a focus on early‑stage treatment and whole‑person outcomes. He earned his undergraduate degree in Biochemistry at Texas Tech University, received his Doctor of Dental Surgery from the University of Texas Health Science Center in San Antonio, and completed his residency and Master of Science in Orthodontics at the University of Texas Health Science Center in Houston. Dr. Cometti is committed to predictable, evidence‑based treatment and to serving families across Northeastern Wyoming.

image.alt: Dr. Peyton Cometti, orthodontist at Cometti Orthodontics

paragraphs.text: From discreet clear aligners to traditional braces and lifelong retention, our services are tailored to each patient’s needs.

image.alt: Cometti Orthodontics team and clinic lobby in Gillette, WY

paragraphs.text: At Cometti Orthodontics in Gillette, WY, we're committed to loving and serving our patients, our community, and our team. We believe every person deserves care that looks after more than just teeth, and we treat each patient with compassion and respect.

Our goal is to provide excellent orthodontic care that fits your life. We focus on whole-person health, creating treatment plans tailored to each patient’s needs and lifestyle so care is comfortable, convenient, and effective.

We offer modern, evidence-informed orthodontic options for children, teens, and adults. From early-stage intervention to comprehensive treatment, our team uses thoughtful techniques and up‑to‑date technology to help patients achieve healthier, more confident smiles.

Beyond clinical care we strive to make a positive impact in the community. We serve local organizations, support youth ministries, and build long-term relationships so patients and families feel welcome and cared for at every visit.

image.alt: Dr. Peyton Cometti smiling in the Cometti Orthodontics office

paragraphs.text: Peyton Cometti, D.D.S., M.S.D. graduated Summa Cum Laude in Biochemistry from Texas Tech University. He earned his Doctor of Dental Surgery degree from the University of Texas Health Science Center in San Antonio, then completed residency training in Orthodontics and Dentofacial Orthopedics and a Master of Science at the University of Texas Health Science Center in Houston.

Dr. Cometti is Board Certified by the American Board of Orthodontics and is an active member of the American Association of Orthodontists, the Wyoming Association of Orthodontists, the American Dental Association, the Wyoming Dental Association, and the Powder River Dental Association.

He began his practice career in Lubbock, TX and later practiced in Wyoming with Meyer and Dana Orthodontics before establishing Cometti Orthodontics. That experience helped shape his commitment to care in smaller communities and to building long-term patient relationships.

Dr. Cometti focuses on early-stage orthodontic treatment and comprehensive care for patients of all ages. He emphasizes individualized plans that address function and long-term oral health while helping patients gain confidence in their smiles.
He stays current with advances in orthodontics and combines proven techniques with modern technology to deliver predictable, comfortable treatment experiences.

Outside the office Dr. Cometti is a family man, sharing life with his wife Casey and their four children. He enjoys outdoor sports and weekend mountain adventures, is active in church and youth ministry, and supports local businesses and ministries in the community.
He values the chance to invest in a community like Gillette and looks forward to caring for local families for years to come.

slides.alt: Office treatment area with modern equipment
Reception and waiting area at Cometti Orthodontics

paragraphs.text: We use the resources of our practice to serve local organizations, support youth ministries, and back small businesses across our community. Cometti Orthodontics accepts sponsorship requests for events and causes that align with our values. To submit a request, please complete the Sponsorship Request form at https://comettiorthodontics.com/contact-us/sponsorship-request/ (form includes reCAPTCHA and fields for event details, dates, and recognition opportunities).

Get Started.title: Your First Orthodontic Visit in Gillette, WY

paragraphs.text: Welcome to Cometti Orthodontics. We are excited to meet you and help you achieve a healthy, confident smile. Your first visit is an opportunity for us to get to know you, review your concerns, and introduce you to our team.

Begin your appointment by checking in with our friendly reception team. To save time, you can complete patient forms online before your visit using our secure portal at comettiorthodontics.com/new-patients/patient-forms/.

During the consultation we perform a comprehensive exam, including X-rays, photographs, and digital impressions when needed. Dr. Cometti and the clinical team will explain findings and outline treatment options such as braces or clear aligners.

We will review insurance, financing, and scheduling. If you are ready, we often reserve time to get started the same day, and we will schedule any follow-up visits needed to begin your personalized treatment plan.

image.alt: Father with daughter at reception of dentist's surgery

paragraphs.text: We understand cost can be a concern, so we offer flexible payment options and work with many insurance plans to help you get the care you need. Our team assists with insurance claims and will help you understand your benefits.

We offer PatientFi financing for easy monthly payments. Apply in seconds at https://app.patientfi.com/v2/comettiortho/enterprise, or estimate payments with the calculator at https://app.patientfi.com/v2/payment-calculator. PatientFi offers instant approvals and no hard credit checks, and we accept all major credit cards.

To streamline check-in, please complete patient forms online before your visit at https://comettiorthodontics.com/new-patients/patient-forms/. Filling out forms ahead of time lets us focus on your exam and treatment planning when you arrive.
We also offer a Patient Rewards Program to celebrate great patients. Earn points for appointments and redeem them for prizes and gift cards. Learn more and sign up on our Patient Rewards page.

image.alt: Patient filling out orthodontic health history forms online

image.alt: Brackets on patient | Orthodontic Care in Gillette, WY

paragraphs.text: We believe in catching orthodontic issues early. Our early-stage treatment guides jaw growth and development to reduce the need for more complex care later.
Lay the foundation for a lifetime of healthy smiles with kid-friendly exams and early intervention when needed. We screen for airway and growth concerns and coordinate care with other specialists.
We create teen-focused treatment plans that balance effectiveness and esthetics, including ceramic braces and clear aligner options to fit school and activities.
Adult patients receive discreet, efficient treatment tailored to busy lives. We offer clear aligners and esthetic braces that fit professional and personal needs.
Durable and cost-effective, metal braces use brackets and wires to move teeth predictably. They remain a reliable choice for many kinds of tooth movement.

image.alt: Braces | Orthodontic Care in Gillette, WY

paragraphs.text: Ceramic braces blend with tooth color for a less noticeable look while still delivering effective results, a good option for appearance-conscious patients.
Clear aligners are a discreet, removable option. We offer Spark aligners and Invisalign<sup>®</sup> for many patients who want minimal impact on daily life.

image.alt: Clear aligners | Orthodontic Care in Gillette, WY

paragraphs.text: After treatment we fit custom retainers and outline a clear retention plan to help you keep your new smile for years to come.

image.alt: Patient smiling with orthodontic braces in our Emeryville office

paragraphs.text: At Cometti Orthodontics, we understand that orthodontic treatment can raise many questions. That's why we've compiled a list of frequently asked questions to provide you with the answers you need. If you have any additional questions or concerns, don't hesitate to contact our team of experts.

accordion.header: What orthodontic treatments do you offer?

paragraphs.text: We offer traditional braces for children, teens, and adults, clear aligner therapy including Invisalign<sup>®</sup> for a discreet option, and custom retainers to maintain your results.

accordion.header: When should my child have their first orthodontic visit?

paragraphs.text: The American Association of Orthodontists recommends an orthodontic evaluation by age 7. Early visits let us monitor growth and intervene when treatment can be simplest and most effective.

accordion.header: How long does treatment typically last?

paragraphs.text: Treatment time varies by case, but many patients finish care between 12 and 24 months. We'll give you a personalized timeline after your initial exam and treatment plan.

accordion.header: Can my child or teen still play sports with braces?

paragraphs.text: Yes. We strongly recommend a properly fitted mouthguard to protect both the teeth and the braces during sports and high-impact activities.

accordion.header: How can I maintain good oral hygiene with braces?

paragraphs.text: Brush teeth at least twice a day, floss daily, and avoid sticky or hard foods that can damage brackets. Regular checkups and professional cleanings help keep your smile healthy during treatment.

accordion.header: How does clear aligner treatment work?

paragraphs.text: Clear aligner therapy uses a series of custom, removable trays to move teeth gradually. Wear aligners about 22 hours per day and change to the next set as directed, typically every one to two weeks.

accordion.header: How do braces work to straighten teeth?

paragraphs.text: Braces apply gentle, continuous pressure through brackets and wires to guide teeth into new positions. Your orthodontist adjusts the system over time to achieve the planned result.

accordion.header: What payment and insurance options are available?

paragraphs.text: We offer flexible monthly payment plans and accept most major dental insurance carriers. Our team will help you understand coverage and find financing that works for your family.

accordion.header: How can I schedule an appointment?

paragraphs.text: Scheduling is easy: call us at (307) 257-8029 or request an appointment online at https://comettiorthodontics.com/contact-us/request-an-appointment/. We'll find a time that fits your schedule.
